name: Rainbow Night: Extreme
description:
Put your glam rock makeup and run through the electric city to become as powerful as you can! Rainbow Night is the adventure of Ziggy, a musician space traveler who is visiting a retro-futuristic planet intending to collect all the power gems from a mysterious meteor. Tonight, you can switch your colors and then go through beyond objects with same color, and you must to do it hurry, jump over all the traps and escape from all the obstacles.

Enjoy this sidescroller and those beautiful pixel graphics, get it on your mobile or web-browser and became a jumping hero! Bring your colors to the night, in a flash, and become the Rainbow Night!
